OrgName.entry: SHELTER HOUSING SUPPORT SERVICE, CENTRAL SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides practical and emotional support to any household in the Central Housing Area and Netherthorpe and Upperthorpe who may be experiencing difficulties in maintaining their tenancy, including existing tenants and new tenants moving into the area. Includes DIY skills adviser service; advice on housing, benefits, debt etc; accompanied viewings; assistance with moving house; finding furniture/appliances; utility connection; access to medical services; arranging childcare; liaison with schools; information on the local area; help with independent living skills. Self or any referral. This service will change from January 2011.
